decoworld.model.world.entities

Class PotionEffect

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.model.world.entities.PotionEffect
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StatEffect

    public class PotionEffect
extends java.lang.Object
implements StatEffect
    A persistent effect that will increase the stat of a player (such as health) over time. This will not bring a player back from the dead.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      PotionEffect(Player player, StatType stat, double strength)

      boolean shouldOvercharge()
      Returns a boolean indicating whether this stat effect should be able to increase the statistic value above the maximum value.
      double valueDelta(double tick)
      Returns a delta that is applied to a stat's value.

    • Method Detail

      • valueDelta

        public double valueDelta(double tick)
        Description copied from interface: StatEffect
        Returns a delta that is applied to a stat's value. For example, value = value + valueDelta() This is a simplistic example and other resistances or bonuses may be applied. The delta can be positive to add value or negative to remove value.
        Specified by:
        valueDelta in interface StatEffect
        Returns:
        delta - the amount of value to add

      • getSender

        public WorldItem getSender()
        Description copied from interface: StatEffect
        Returns the WorldItem that caused this effect (e.g. an arrow). If a WorldItem did not cause this effect (e.g. you fell off a cliff and died), then return NULL
        Specified by:
        getSender in interface StatEffect
        Returns:
        sender - the WorldItem that caused this effect.

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        Description copied from interface: StatEffect
        Returns whether this effect is still active. StatEffects that don't deactivate after use are effects that could repeatedly modify a Stat.
        Specified by:
        isActive in interface StatEffect
        Returns:
        boolean - whether the effect is active

      • shouldOvercharge

        public boolean shouldOvercharge()
        Description copied from interface: StatEffect

        Specified by:

        Returns:
